data.eml:eml: Zanna robusticephalica sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Fulgoridae) from China, with comments on some ultrastructural characters of the new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liang, Ai-Ping (2017): Zanna robusticephalica sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Fulgoridae) from China, with comments on some ultrastructural characters of the new species. Zootaxa 4338 (2): 361-373, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.2.10
